entry.def: The seventh item in a series is the one that you count as number seven.

example.ex: I was the seventh child in a family of 11.
example.tran: 我在家里的 11 个孩子中排行老七。

entry.def: A seventh is one of seven equal parts of something.

example.ex: A million people died, a seventh of the population.
example.tran: 共有 100 万人丧生，占总人口的七分之一。

means.word_mean: 1. position seven in a countable series of things
3. the musical interval between one note and another seven notes away from it
1. coming next after the sixth and just before the eighth in position

Sentence.sentence: The newer trend is to start recruiting poor and non-white students as early as the seventh grade, using innovative tools to identify kids with sophisticated verbal skills.

sentences.en: He was knocked out in the seventh round.
sentences.cn: 他在第七回合被打晕了。

sentences.en: He’s pulled up from the seventh to the second place.

sentences.en: July is the seventh month of the year.

sentences.en: When she has all her grandchildren around her, she’s in seventh heaven.
sentences.cn: 儿孙们都围在她的身旁，她尽享天伦之乐。
